description: EventsChart is the Schema for the eventscharts API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

settings.description:
Default JetStream settings, could be overridden by EventBus JetStream spec
Ref: https://docs.nats.io/running-a-nats-service/configuration#jetstream

maxFileStore.description: -- Maximum size of the file storage (e.g. 20G)

maxMemoryStore.description: -- Maximum size of the memory storage (e.g. 1G)

maxAge.description: -- Maximum age of existing messages, i.e. “72h”, “4h35m”

maxBytes.description: Total size of messages before expiring oldest message, 0 means unlimited.

maxMsgs.description: -- Maximum number of messages before expiring oldest message

replicas.description: -- Number of replicas, defaults to 3 and requires minimal 3

items.description: JetstreamConfigVersionsConfig defines the jetstream config versions configuration

versions.description:
-- Supported versions of NATS event bus
@default -- See [values.yaml]

items.description: VersionsConfig defines the versions configuration

affinity.description: -- Assign custom [affinity] rules to the deployment

nodeAffinity.description: NodeAffinityConfig defines the node affinity configuration

nodeSelectorTerm.description: NodeSelectorTermConfig defines the node selector term configuration

items.description: MatchExpressionsConfig defines the match expressions configuration

nodeSelectorTerm.description: MatchExpressionsConfigNodeSelectorTermConfig defines the match expressions config node selector term configuration

items.description: MatchExpressionsConfigNodeSelectorTermConfigMatchExpressionsConfig defines the match expressions config node selector term config match expressions configuration

env.description: -- Environment variables to pass to events controller

items.description: EnvConfig defines the env configuration

envFrom.description:
-- envFrom to pass to events controller
@default -- `[]` (See [values.yaml])

items.description: EnvFromConfig defines the env from configuration

configMapRef.description: ConfigMapRefConfig defines the config map ref configuration

secretRef.description: SecretRefConfig defines the secret ref configuration

image.description: ControllerConfigImageConfig defines the controller config image configuration

imagePullPolicy.description:
-- Image pull policy for the events controller
@default -- `""` (defaults to global.image.imagePullPolicy)

repository.description:
-- Repository to use for the events controller
@default -- `""` (defaults to global.image.repository)

tag.description:
-- Tag to use for the events controller
@default -- `""` (defaults to global.image.tag)

livenessProbe.description: LivenessProbeConfig defines the liveness probe configuration

failureThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive failures for the [probe] to be considered failed after having succeeded

initialDelaySeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after the container has started before [probe] is initiated

periodSeconds.description: -- How often (in seconds) to perform the [probe]

successThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive successes for the [probe] to be considered successful after having failed

timeoutSeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after which the [probe] times out

serviceMonitor.description: ServiceMonitorConfig defines the service monitor configuration

metricRelabelings.description: -- Prometheus [MetricRelabelConfigs] to apply to samples before ingestion

items.description: MetricRelabelingsConfig defines the metric relabelings configuration

relabelings.description: -- Prometheus [RelabelConfigs] to apply to samples before scraping

items.description: RelabelingsConfig defines the relabelings configuration

matchLabels.description: MatchLabelsConfig defines the match labels configuration

annotations.description: -- Annotations to be added to events controller pdb

enabled.description: -- Deploy a PodDisruptionBudget for the events controller

labels.description:
minAvailable: 1
maxUnavailable: 0
-- Labels to be added to events controller pdb

podAnnotations.description: -- Annotations to be added to events controller pods

podLabels.description: -- Labels to be added to events controller pods

priorityClassName.description: -- Priority class for the events controller pods

managedNamespace.description: -- Additional namespace to be monitored by the controller

namespaced.description: -- Restrict events controller to operate only in a single namespace instead of cluster-wide scope.

rules.description: -- Additional user rules for event controller's rbac

items.description: RulesConfig defines the rules configuration

readinessProbe.description:
# Readiness and liveness probes for default backend
# Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-liveness-readiness-startup-probes/

failureThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive failures for the [probe] to be considered failed after having succeeded

initialDelaySeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after the container has started before [probe] is initiated

periodSeconds.description: -- How often (in seconds) to perform the [probe]

successThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive successes for the [probe] to be considered successful after having failed

timeoutSeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after which the [probe] times out

replicas.description: -- The number of events controller pods to run.

resources.description: -- Resource limits and requests for the events controller pods

revisionHistoryLimit.description: -- The number of replicasets history to keep

serviceAccount.description: ServiceAccountConfig defines the service account configuration

annotations.description: -- Annotations applied to created service account

automountServiceAccountToken.description: -- Automount API credentials for the Service Account

create.description: -- Create a service account for the events controller

items.description: TolerationsConfig defines the tolerations configuration

topologySpreadConstraints.description:
-- Assign custom [TopologySpreadConstraints] rules to the events controller
# Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/topology-spread-constraints/
# If labelSelector is left out, it will default to the labelSelector configuration of the deployment

items.description: TopologySpreadConstraintsConfig defines the topology spread constraints configuration

volumeMounts.description: -- Additional volumeMounts to the events controller main container

items.description: VolumeMountsConfig defines the volume mounts configuration

volumes.description: -- Additional volumes to the events controller pod

items.description: VolumesConfig defines the volumes configuration

emptyDir.description: EmptyDirConfig defines the empty dir configuration

annotations.description: -- Annotations to be added to all CRDs

createAggregateRoles.description:
-- Create clusterroles that extend existing clusterroles to interact with argo-events crds
Only applies for cluster-wide installation (`controller.rbac.namespaced: false`)
# Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/access-authn-authz/rbac/#aggregated-clusterroles

additionalLabels.description: -- Additional labels to add to all resources

hostAliases.description: -- Mapping between IP and hostnames that will be injected as entries in the pod's hosts files

items.description: HostAliasesConfig defines the host aliases configuration

imagePullPolicy.description: -- If defined, a imagePullPolicy applied to all Argo Events deployments

repository.description: -- If defined, a repository applied to all Argo Events deployments

tag.description: -- Overrides the global Argo Events image tag whose default is the chart appVersion

imagePullSecrets.description: -- If defined, uses a Secret to pull an image from a private Docker registry or repository

items.description: ImagePullSecretsConfig defines the image pull secrets configuration

podAnnotations.description: -- Annotations for the all deployed pods

podLabels.description: -- Labels for the all deployed pods

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

nameOverride.description: -- Provide a name in place of `argo-events`

affinity.description: -- Assign custom [affinity] rules to the deployment

nodeAffinity.description: WebhookConfigAffinityConfigNodeAffinityConfig defines the webhook config affinity config node affinity configuration

required.description: WebhookConfigAffinityConfigNodeAffinityConfigRequiredConfig defines the webhook config affinity config node affinity config required configuration

nodeSelectorTerm.description: WebhookConfigAffinityConfigNodeAffinityConfigRequiredConfigNodeSelectorTermConfig defines the webhook config affinity config node affinity config required config node selector term configuration

items.description: WebhookConfigAffinityConfigNodeAffinityConfigRequiredConfigNodeSelectorTermConfigMatchExpressionsConfig defines the webhook config affinity config node affinity config required config node selector term config match expressions configuration

nodeSelectorTerm.description: WebhookConfigAffinityConfigNodeAffinityConfigRequiredConfigNodeSelectorTermConfigMatchExpressionsConfigNodeSelectorTermConfig defines the webhook config affinity config node affinity config required config node selector term config match expressions config node selector term configuration

items.description: WebhookConfigAffinityConfigNodeAffinityConfigRequiredConfigNodeSelectorTermConfigMatchExpressionsConfigNodeSelectorTermConfigMatchExpressionsConfig defines the webhook config affinity config node affinity config required config node selector term config match expressions config node selector term config match expressions configuration

capabilities.description: WebhookConfigContainerSecurityContextConfigCapabilitiesConfig defines the webhook config container security context config capabilities configuration

enabled.description: -- Enable admission webhook. Applies only for cluster-wide installation

env.description:
-- Environment variables to pass to event controller
@default -- `[]` (See [values.yaml])

items.description: WebhookConfigEnvConfig defines the webhook config env configuration

envFrom.description:
-- envFrom to pass to event controller
@default -- `[]` (See [values.yaml])

items.description: WebhookConfigEnvFromConfig defines the webhook config env from configuration

configMapRef.description: WebhookConfigEnvFromConfigConfigMapRefConfig defines the webhook config env from config config map ref configuration

secretRef.description: WebhookConfigEnvFromConfigSecretRefConfig defines the webhook config env from config secret ref configuration

image.description: WebhookConfigImageConfig defines the webhook config image configuration

imagePullPolicy.description:
-- Image pull policy for the event controller
@default -- `""` (defaults to global.image.imagePullPolicy)

repository.description:
-- Repository to use for the event controller
@default -- `""` (defaults to global.image.repository)

tag.description:
-- Tag to use for the event controller
@default -- `""` (defaults to global.image.tag)

livenessProbe.description: WebhookConfigLivenessProbeConfig defines the webhook config liveness probe configuration

failureThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive failures for the [probe] to be considered failed after having succeeded

initialDelaySeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after the container has started before [probe] is initiated

periodSeconds.description: -- How often (in seconds) to perform the [probe]

successThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive successes for the [probe] to be considered successful after having failed

timeoutSeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after which the [probe] times out

name.description: -- Argo Events admission webhook name string

annotations.description: -- Annotations to be added to admission webhook pdb

enabled.description: -- Deploy a PodDisruptionBudget for the admission webhook

labels.description:
minAvailable: 1
maxUnavailable: 0
-- Labels to be added to admission webhook pdb

podAnnotations.description: -- Annotations to be added to event controller pods

podLabels.description: -- Labels to be added to event controller pods

priorityClassName.description: -- Priority class for the event controller pods

# Readiness and liveness probes for default backend

initialDelaySeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after the container has started before [probe] is initiated

periodSeconds.description: -- How often (in seconds) to perform the [probe]

successThreshold.description: -- Minimum consecutive successes for the [probe] to be considered successful after having failed

timeoutSeconds.description: -- Number of seconds after which the [probe] times out

replicas.description: -- The number of webhook pods to run.

limits.description: WebhookConfigResourcesConfigLimitsConfig defines the webhook config resources config limits configuration

requests.description: WebhookConfigResourcesConfigRequestsConfig defines the webhook config resources config requests configuration

revisionHistoryLimit.description: -- The number of replicasets history to keep

serviceAccount.description: WebhookConfigServiceAccountConfig defines the webhook config service account configuration

annotations.description: -- Annotations applied to created service account

automountServiceAccountToken.description: -- Automount API credentials for the Service Account

create.description: -- Create a service account for the admission webhook

items.description: WebhookConfigTolerationsConfig defines the webhook config tolerations configuration

-- Assign custom [TopologySpreadConstraints] rules to the event controller
